mapper.update:
update KQDS_Visit
createuser = #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
visittime = #{visittime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
visitor = #{visitor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
usercode = #{usercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
telphone = #{telphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hffl = #{hffl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
finishtime = #{finishtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hfyd = #{hfyd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
organization = #{organization,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
myd = #{myd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
postperson = #{postperson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hfresult = #{hfresult,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
regno = #{regno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
purpose = #{purpose,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
isauto = #{isauto,jdbcType=INTEGER},
isfirstday = #{isfirstday,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where SEQ_ID = #{seqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update KQDS_Visit set createuser = #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, visittime = #{visittime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, visitor = #{visitor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, usercode = #{usercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, telphone = #{telphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hffl = #{hffl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, finishtime = #{finishtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hfyd = #{hfyd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, organization = #{organization,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, myd = #{myd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, postperson = #{postperson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hfresult = #{hfresult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, regno = #{regno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, purpose = #{purpose,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isauto = #{isauto,jdbcType=INTEGER}, isfirstday = #{isfirstday,jdbcType=INTEGER} where SEQ_ID = #{seqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select COUNT(1) from KQDS_Visit v left join KQDS_UserDocument u on u.usercode = v.usercode where 1=1 and v.organization = #{organization}
and (v.visitor in (${visualstaff}))
and visittime like '${visittime}%'
and (u.usercode like '%' + #{searchValue} + '%' or u.username like '%' + #{searchValue} + '%' or ${p1} or ${p2} or u.pym like '%' + #{searchValue} + '%' )
select usercode,visitor,username,visittime from KQDS_Visit where 1=1 and v.visittime <= #{_parameter} and status = 0 group by usercode order by createtime desc
mapper.delete: DELETE from kqds_push where reciveuser = #{visitor} and remindurl = '/kqdsFront/visit/visit_list.jsp?usercode='+ #{visitor} + ''
DELETE from KQDS_VISIT where seq_id like '' + #{_parameter} + '%' and status = 0
mapper.select: select v.SEQ_ID,v.usercode,v.username,v.sex,v.telphone,v.hfyd,v.visitor,p.user_name as visitorname from KQDS_VISIT v left join sys_person p on v.visitor=p.seq_id where v.visittime=#{time} and v.visitor=#{seqid}

select v.seq_id as vseqid, okdi1.dict_name as myd, okdi2.dict_name as hffl1, dept2.DEPT_NAME as visitdeptname, ps.user_name as visitor1 from KQDS_Visit v LEFT JOIN SYS_DICT okdi1 on okdi1.seq_id = v.myd LEFT JOIN SYS_DICT okdi2 on okdi2.seq_id = v.hffl LEFT JOIN SYS_PERSON ps on ps.seq_id = v.visitor LEFT JOIN SYS_DEPT dept2 on ps.dept_id = dept2.seq_id where v.seq_id in (${seqid})
select count(1) as num,usercode from KQDS_Member where usercode in (${usercode}) group by usercode
select count(usercode) as ywhf,usercode from KQDS_Visit where usercode in (${usercodes}) group by usercode
